Negative_Review: There is nothing that I didn t like other than Water pressure isn t enough at top floors Room size tiny Carpets needs changing Only single lift No onsite restaurant Only bed and breakfast Above is a the list of lack of facilities at the hotel not that I didn t like
Positive_Review: Location location location location Next to eiffel tower just 5 minutes walking distance Well connected from underground Posh area Can even walk around middle of night fear free Room very clean and amenities of 5 star level Very helpful and accommodating staff 24 hour reception desk Supermarket next door So much good about this hotel Really enjoyed my stay

The staff were very accommodating The room was very clean I loved the fact that we were given a cell phone to use while we were registered guests This was a great tool to have while we were travelling It was nice to have access to the mini bar fridge in the room

Negative_Review: Going to hotel parking was a bit cumbersome especially when there s no temporary parking space in front of hotel But in general it was really good to have the parking Otherwise it would have been a lot problematic Construction of adjacent restaurant etc made the entrance to look a bit messy As a result breakfast was also served in a meeting room but breakfast was good though
Positive_Review: Small boutique hotel just 500m from Eiffel tower Really well kept and with good service Room was really big junior suite and bathroom amenities best what we saw in our travel our of ten different hotels Overall really nice hotel

Negative_Review: Stayed here after cycling L2P At checkin was upgraded and told minibar was complimentary After that it became very disappointing The hotel is undergoing refurbishment of the bar restaurant As a result the hotel is completely dry the mini bar had only 4 soft drinks in it and you cannot order any alcoholic beverages not great when you were after a celebratory beer Room service is via an online system the hotel has arrangements to have food ordered in nothing is made onsite After ordering Italian the 45 minute guaranteed order time came and went After 55 minutes reception agreed to chase the order up 10 minutes later we were advised that due to inclement weather it would be a further 1 2 hours wait Not at all great at now 11pm Sunday night Breakfast was nice very hungry by this time albeit it was in a small cramped room with more low chairs and coffee tables rather than proper tables and chairs I presume another casualty of the refurb I suspect this is a nice hotel when fully operational but it was an expensive disappointment for us We were not aware of the refurb when booking via booking dot com if so we would have stopped elsewhere
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The elevator shut down for almost half a day and they should have had a back up plan especially if we needed to be at our room that very moment to freshen up for another occasion
Positive_Review: Just didn t get my free airport shuttle after checking out but they were efficient in handling transpo matters everything was on time and staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: carpet in the room could be cleaner
Positive_Review: Perfect location 5 mins from the eiffel tower and 20 mins from Champs Elysee we walked everywhere in Paris and this hotel was the perfect base We were lucky to get a room on the 5th floor with a balcony facing the Eiffel Tower this made our stay so special

Negative_Review: Bed was too hard for my liking but it was the same everywhere we stayed so must be a Europe thing
Positive_Review: Great breakfast In a really good area that is five minutes walk to the Eiffel Tower two minutes to the Metro Found an amazing patisserie go right out the main door and I think second street on the right We also got a mobile with our room that had a city mapper app so we found our way everywhere really easily

Negative_Review: Need to change the carpet urgently Also more professional printed materials most paper signage ex wifi password phone signage etc was printed in house on normal paper
Positive_Review: Great location Staff were fantastic

The hotel is in a great location only a few minutes walk from cole Militaire Metro and a short distance to the Eiffel Tower and Les Invalides There is a supermarket next door to the hotel which was great for buying water etc Despite its location the hotel was peaceful and quiet The hotel is also in a good location for restaurants make you way to Rue Cler for a really enjoyable evening The hotel itself is pleasant We had two Executive Double Rooms which were an adequate size one room was smaller than the other but had a very large bathroom The rooms were clean and comfortable Breakfast was lovely Everything was fresh and there was a good selection All the staff from the front desk to the cleaners were a credit to the hotel very pleasant and helpful Overall we had a really lovely stay and I wouldn t hesitate in recommending this hotel or staying at it again

Negative_Review: Parking The hotel doesnt have its own parking so have to park nearby which is expensive
Positive_Review: This is walking distance from Eiffle Tower Staff is very helping and always respectful Always ready to help and guide

Negative_Review: Coffee machine was broken in our room and was not fixed for the duration of our stay the did however offer us coffee in the lobby instead
Positive_Review: The breakfast was fantastic The room was a good size for us and the aircon was great

Negative_Review: We booked a Junior Suite for quite an expensive rate and got a small dark room 1sr floor looking to the trash in the back yard We then complaint and got the same room in the sixt floor I just booked this hotel due to the great reports on booking com but having been there people must have been crazy or stayed another hotel I would not go there again there are many more hotels in Paris with a better offer
Positive_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: For the class of hotel the breakfast could be better or provide more options
Positive_Review: Beautiful rooms great location great facilities friendly staff and close to Eiffel Tower

Negative_Review: Bed wasn t comfortable felt like sleeping on the floor The fridge in the room didn t keep the drinks cold don t think it worked
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: We booked a room for two adults and a four years old child Arrived and were told at the reception we had to book a different room because the law does not allow a child to sleep with us What The room was changed without additional charges but I suspect they chose the worst room in the hotel instead it was the first floor windows had bars and practically no light inside Outside was a dirty place with lots of garbage bottles wrappings and cigarette butts tons of them We decided not to have a look thru the windows as we were not going to stay in the hotel all time but after the first night we left It was really bad experience seemed the room was dirty and we felt uncomfortable then we waked up because of a smell of food it s likely some kitchen were under the room Never again
Positive_Review: Location only

Negative_Review: The only complaint was the bathroom was freezing cold We had to run the shower so the steam would help heat it up
Positive_Review: Located Ina great neighbourhood about a 5 10 minutes walk from the hop on hop off bus stops or a 20 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower There are a few gift shops a few massage parlours and a bank located on that street

Beautiful boutique hotel Very friendly staff who speak English There are is also a grocery store next door where you can buy groceries if you don t want to eat out Eiffel Tower could be viewed from room Had a cot in the room for a child and it was very comfortable

Located centrally close to everything that you need even the Paris tour office is located close by there are good Indian Chinese continental food restaurant closeby metro and supermarket are very near

Negative_Review: Breakfast is expensive for what is offered but it is served by staff who is very accommodating The room was freshened up every day by cleaning staff but we noticed that toiletries were not refreshed every day and glasses not replaced
Positive_Review: We stay at this hotel every time we come to Paris as its location is excellent for both practical and tourist options It is close to a metro stop that is on a good line for taking you anywhere Also can easily find cash machines two grocery stores next door plenty of shopping and restaurants and the Eiffel Tower is a 5 minute walk The hotel has been very recently remodeled in a tasteful decor and the front desk staff is very helpful and friendly It is located on a busy street but the windows are extremely sound proof so it feels very quiet Plenty of lounging space in the bar breakfast area We would get a bottle wine at the grocery store next door and relax in the lounge area and have some wine before dinner the staff was very nice to bring us wine glasses on request and even uncork it for us Also recommend Booking com for reservations best pricing and reservation options we have found

So far this is my favourite hotel in Paris it well priced considering the location close to Eiffel Tower metro station around the corner Street full of great restaurants cafe s and next to a supermarkets that closed late not mentioning room larg size hard to find in Paris and wonderful stuff The most important things to me are the cleanness and safety even the bread crumbs under the chair got cleaned and the metro station and streets to the hotel at night was crowded lighted and alive

Negative_Review: The room we got has a separate toilet from the shower which i find weird But that did not bother me so much at all because the experience was overall wonderful
Positive_Review: It is the best hotel we have stayed in Paris so far The location the cleanliness of the room and the property proximity to metro grocery and Eiffel Tower the staff Everything and everyone was so lovely
Andrei was great So helpful and warm It was a pleasure to interact with him He let the impression there is nothing it can t be done and resolved Thank you

Negative_Review: Description of hotel is not clear regarding the following there is no parking and they didnt mention that we need to make a reservation in advance comparing with description details of room size its small in real In picture and description they mentioned that there is clear view of eiffel tower which is not actually true there wasnt an employee to help us carry the luggage to my room i would personaly rate it as a 2 stars hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: This is not about the hotel The female receptionist recommended us Le Terrasse which is just across the street but it was not good at all
Positive_Review: The breakfast was really nice
That was the first time we ve been in this hotel We were pleasantly surprised when we got the upgrade on check in That was a great view from the balcony of the room to the Eiffel tower

Negative_Review: The receptionist guy withdraw the amount for a second time And when I told him he cancelled the first one And after a week nothing came back
Positive_Review: Location is great near Eiffel Tower Staff is so helpful and nice The hotel provides you with a mobile phone with free internet

Negative_Review: Almost nothing left when we arrived at the last 45 mins for breakfast but still needed to pay full price Shower was cold after 11 pm Junior suit too small for a family of 4 Overall too expensive for what it is
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The hotel rooms need some decorating They look a little worn out The double sofa bed is not comfortable at all there was a great big dip in the middle The A C in our room was not working which meant we couldn t turn the heating up We were told it was working fine but couldn t feel any heat hence the request for extra blankets
Positive_Review: The service of the hotel was excellent offered drinks on arrival we requested extra blankets which was given immediately Tea facilities and coffee machine bathrobe slippers hermes toiletries mini bar and free phone to use out and about which was excellent staff were very friendly and helpful fulfilling our every request The location is brilliant a few mins away from eiffel tower Metro and bus stop literally 2 mins away A supermarket right next door to hotel

Our best stay so far on our 1 month long trip The first time that we have had gorgeously soft pillows and I slept so well On arrival we were upgraded to a bigger room with views of the Eiffel Tower The room was fabulous Stylish decor separate toilet large bath tea coffee facilities and courtesy drinks in the fridge The location is fantastic Next to close to 2 grocery stores cafes the Metro and a short walk through the park to the Eiffel Tower Lovely staff We will definitely stay here again next time we are in Paris

Negative_Review: Chamber maid did not refill the used toiletries Breakfast comes in little variety and no selection of hot soup to keep yourself warm during the cold winter days
Positive_Review: Gorgeous hotel in lovely settings Beddings were very comfortable and it kept us real nice and warm even when we open the windows during the cold night Julien was very nice and helpful We felt very welcome during our arrival and he upgraded us to a larger room It was just a 10 minutes walk away to the Eiffel Tower 20 minutes walk to Eau de Triomphe And 2 minutes walk away from Ecole Militarie Metro Station to the hotel There s a great Chinese restaurant named Fontaine de Jade which is 2 streets away or 5 minutes walk away from the hotel They serve great Singaporean and Chinese cuisine There s a huge groceries store next to the hotel You can get literally everything in stores

The location is great near to the metro station 2 minutes only and near to Eiffel Tower 10 minutes walking the area its really good the Carefore supermarket near to the hotel also friendly staff clean and the wifi good

Negative_Review: Everything was great the bed could have been a little more comfortable
Positive_Review: The staff was so nice and helpful The location was great and the hotel was so cute We loved our stay

Negative_Review: After checking in I changed rooms with the one with bathtub but just noticed I left my purse to the previoius room with all of my credit cards and cash I contacted the front to ask him to check the guy said there s nothing but it was apparent he did not check exactly I asked him twice but he said guest was sleeping nor he checked in 30 hours ago just after 30 mins of my changing room so i decided to go by myself it was just 5 meteres from my room and the guy just checked in the room was very friendly and handed me my purse the receptioninist just called up the gentleman in the room but he explained that he found the purse and handed me when i returned after 30 seconds a phone at my room was ringing and ringing and the receptionist just said I said I would check for you why did you go I just do not understand his attitude but except this experience the overall staying there was good

Positive_Review: Location was great Lots of good restaurants close to the Hotel Coffee team soft drinks available in the room

1 the bed and pillows are amazingly comfy especially after long day exploring the city 2 location is easily accessible and nearby to all transportations taxi metro bus 3 quite central blocks away to the famous tour eiffel if you like to walk around enjoying the view anytime this hotel is perfect

Negative_Review: Can t give my opinion about the breakfast it was not included in my stay
Positive_Review: Very well located modern clean room nice staff they offered a free room upgrade a free cell phone is available for use outside the hotel to make phone calls and internet surfing

Negative_Review: The TV remote did not function properly
Positive_Review: The view The friendliness of the staff The location a supermarket is right next to the hotel while restaurants and metro are a few minutes away

The staff was marvelous I speak very little French and the staff were very courteous friendly and always ready to assist me The location was just a short walk from the Eiffel Tower and with many good and reasonably priced restaurants in the vicinity

Negative_Review: Room was small for an executive room bed throw was badly creased and alarm went off at 1 00 waking us after a very long day Tea and coffee only had 1 milk
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable and the bathroom lovely

Negative_Review: The only minor thing was I could not heat up my room late in the night It was really cold There was rather warm than hot water in shower after midnight Luckily this was not an issue in the morning
Positive_Review: One of the best hotels I have ever stayed at The staff during check in was professional polite and very welcoming I had booked a classic room but was given a junior suite due to hotel being fully booked You get coffee tea amenities plus coffee machine you find Hermes in the bathroom and you are given a smartphone with mobile data which you can carry with you around the city This was pretty much handy when looking for public transport and points of interest The mattress was super firm I got to sleep very well here Breakfast was delicous staff professional as well The elevator was super quick Location is perfect ten minutes to the Eiffel Tower Overall when you enter the hotel there is such a calm ambience spa like scent and you feel happy instantly

Absolutely amazing would recommend it to anybody Eiffel Tower literally just around the corner Upgraded on arrival at no extra cost Had our dog with us which the friendly staff checked on every half hour while we were out having dinner We will definitely be visiting again Georgia and Kristian
I couldn t believe they offered you a free Samsung phone to use and carry with you through out you stay FREE calls and unlimited wifi I would stay here again

Negative_Review: Rooms in reality do not correspond to pictures on website No hair conditioner in the rooms very weak hair dryer
Positive_Review: Very nice location easy to reach all most interesting things Good breakfast Very good coffee place just around the corner La terrace

Location close to Eiffel Tower very handy So many restaurants close by to choose from Ecole Militaire metro station is within a couple of minutes walk making getting around very easy Very nice breakfast mainly continental but with a couple of nice hot dishes too The room itself is huge by Paris standards and very nicely appointed and if your room faces the road you have a glimpse of the tower itself All staff reception breakfast housekeeping etc extremely friendly and welcoming

Negative_Review: The price of the room declared on the website is not what you are going to pay I booked my room for two nights for 465 and prepaid it online but really was charged about 490 It turned out that the hotel before charging converted the EUR amount at which I booked a room into the USD at a much higher exchange rate than the real one Then they charged my EUR bank account with an increased USD amount When I wrote to them asking to reimburse the difference they refused to do it Apparently they consider that each customer is an idiot and will not notice that or they make you pay for the commission charged by their bank or payment system even though 6 is too much of a charge It is not even for the money but the attitude which is astonishing Never came across such a hotel In my country that would be called a fraud and would make a case for the police A customer should not be cheated like that I can only image how they fool people if they do it with everyone paying online Really for a 4 star hotel that charges 230 per night that is a shame
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The door for the shower is like half the size so water gets everywhere
Positive_Review: The beverages in the fridge were all complimentary There is a supermarket right next door which was super convenient
Wonderful location upgraded to a view of the Eiffel tower for my birthday later bought hermes soap and perfume Staff couldn t be faulted Smartphone came in very handy Would highly recommend

Negative_Review: Elevators didn t work the entire time we were there Had to walk up and down 6 flights of stairs after a full day of Paris sightseeing
Positive_Review: Staff was exceptional

Negative_Review: Food and beverage service is a bit basic I think the hotel was short on staff
Positive_Review: Each room comes with a cell phone that one can use to get emails local numbers google This is really really useful I wish more hotels did this

Negative_Review: Parking can be a bit of a difficult if all the spots in the private parking garage are taken
Positive_Review: Very good location Nice area with good restaurants shops cafes and metro nearby Friendly staff speaks good English and is kind enough to help us improve our French

Negative_Review: Noise of children running and jumping could be heard from the floor above ours until around 3 am Although the breakfast is a very nice offering and the food was good they were out of main courses and we had to wait for more to be prepared on more than one morning
Positive_Review: Within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower Room was larger with two twin beds and had updated decor There was an espresso machine in the room and we enjoyed the coffee

Negative_Review: Lift went out couple of times when we were there Quite troublesome since we travelled with a baby stroller
Positive_Review: There s a grocery store Franprix right under this hotel

Negative_Review: first room we were put in was noisy the bathroom sink had the plank missing however the hotel staff were more than accommodating We were relocated to a brilliant room A little bit disappointed it wasn t at the front of the building we were at the back and couldn t see the effiel tower
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic

Small but very cute hotel right next to Eiffel Tower Comfortable well equipped room We was surprised with small mobile phone with free 4G Internet and free calls to EU countries provided for free during our stay

Negative_Review: It was our anniversary and Raphael promised to give a bottle of wine for us but unfortunately it did not happen Raphael noted on it
Positive_Review: The front desk named Raphael was so accommodating and helpful

Very family friendly and some good restaurant recommendations Good customer service Quiet and peaceful we had the junior suite stayed with two children 10 7 for Paris the room was a decent size Would recommend and would stay again in the future

Negative_Review: The bar closed early so I wasn t able to get bar or room service after 11pm Also the fridge in our room wasn t working
Positive_Review: Rooms were well appointed the staff were very professional and the mobile internet phone was a lovely touch The location is excellent and overall the hotel was very nice and clean

Negative_Review: One of the staff members was being quite rude to a family who was complaining about not having hot water for a few hours during the stay She could have handled it in a much nicer way
Positive_Review: Excellent location comfortable rooms wonderful room temperature during extreme Summer heat helpful staff

Negative_Review: Elavator was out of order for one day Had to take stairs
Positive_Review: Location Helpful satff Free smart phone And free goodies in the mini fridge Super market right next door

Negative_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff Rooms modern and nicely decorated big shower good location We enjoyed
Positive_Review: Standard Rooms a bit small but this is Paris

Negative_Review: Lack of a Bar social area was a let down having to leave the premises to join a social gathering was a pity the hotel lacked the social Ambience and felt empty
Positive_Review: Comfortable room and very good breakfast Staff very helpful

Negative_Review: Carpets look very worn in the public spaces Seems to be missing a bit of charm in the decor
Positive_Review: Spacious comfortable rooms Things like light bulbs were fixed right away Extremely convenient location Helpful staff

Negative_Review: the bathroom and the toilets were different that was the only thing we dint like
Positive_Review: the service was amazing even though we stayed for just one night they got us everything we needed and it was very nice of them

Negative_Review: Our toilet was on the opposite side of the room from the bathroom Awkward to walk across bedroom to wash hands after using toilet
Positive_Review: The staff was so friendly and helpful The beds were also very comfortable Loved having access to a phone for finding things and calling home

Negative_Review: Bed is uncomfortable but if it s a short stay it should be fine
Positive_Review: The bed wasn t great but everything else was No service at door to help with bags There was a nice set up in the room and a phone with free phone calls and Internet that you could take around with you I m recovering from a broken leg 3months ago and the location of the hotel allowed me to see everything in one day

Negative_Review: The bed wasn t so comfortable the mattress was deformed on one side
Positive_Review: Free upgrade of the room mobile phone with internet quiet hotel friendly staff

Negative_Review: There are no free parking one elevator
Positive_Review: The staff was so polite and helpfull the location is good there is supermarket next to hotel and many resturant

Negative_Review: When I reserved the room I thought there was a bar at the hotel There was no bar
Positive_Review: We liked the people the location and thought everything was comfortable We would definitely use this hotel again Great Stay

Negative_Review: worst hotel experience in Paris The hotel was dirty there was no electricity on the day of arrival I could not check in until 4PM after an 11h flight Staff was rude and unhelpful
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Stiff mattress felt like sleeping in japanese style
Positive_Review: Close proximity to Eiffel tower bus tour and river cruise Great breakfast and friendly customer service
quality of the room was very good i got an upgrade a mobile phone is provided to customers with free internet and free calls to European US and Canadian numbers

Negative_Review: As with most hotels we visited the breakfast buffet is very expensive and it would be lovely to offer ala carte as well We chose a near by cafe for a lighter breakfast of crepes and croissannts Very good on our budget
Positive_Review: Super location We viewed the Eiffel Tower from our balcony We appreciated the friendly helpful front desk staff My granddaughter accidentally deleted photos from her phone and the young woman at the front desk was most helpful in directing us to the nearest Samsung Store and ordering a taxi to take us there The problem was solved within 2 hours My granddaughter was so thankful

Amazing Hotel Everything was just perfect the staff are extremely nice and helpful the room was wonderful very clean with Hermes toiletries We had a view of the Eiffel Tower from our room balcony Loved the hotel so much we didn t want to go anywhere anymore I will definitely stay here again when I go back to Paris

Negative_Review: The free data phone didn t have any spare power charger and was useless during our entire stay the staff could have made an extra effort to at least get a spare as it is a standard samsung phone only
Positive_Review: Very conveniently located near the Eifel tower and
The room is very good comfortable and with enough space for a small family The hotel location is great Near the Eiffel tower and near a subway station

Negative_Review: We were disappointed to discover the next morning that our coffee fridge items were not refreshed or even cleaned up And the garbage not emptied
Positive_Review: The complimentary use of the mobile phone was wonderful And very valuable during our stay Raphael our front desk clerk was outstanding in his welcoming and helpfulness

Negative_Review: there were no place to leave the towels to dry them we had to leave them on the floor after using once It was room for 3 people Additional bed could be more wide
Positive_Review: We were provided with mobile phone with internet so we could easily use online maps in the city and get directions Location is good Room was clean Bathroom had 2 showers which is convenient

Negative_Review: Layout of the room was a bit tight we had a pullout bed for our daughter Not the best design of the space
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic About 10 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower Several good cafes within three blocks Very convenient to subway Breakfast was very good

Negative_Review: The service was bad and they almost always forgot to complete the room service like bringing soup in all the 6 days I stayed there We had to always call the reception for the missing soup and paper towels We didn t have hot water in the bathroom for three days straight in the mornings Although they were fixing it after 9am which was the time I was out already
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly especially in the breakfast

Negative_Review: My last morning there was no hot water and the day before the elevator was out of order
Positive_Review: The shower was wonderful especially since it was so hot in Paris when I was there The bed is completely comfortable though the room for one person is a bit small or it could have been organized slightly differently so as not to bump into the desk chair almost every time I walked past it The staff is wonderful helpful enthusiastic The air conditioning was a real treat this time with 90 degree weather outside The location is great I walked pretty much everywhere I wanted to go except when I needed to get to the 15th arrt

The staff were amazing and bent the rules a little to make our stay that little bit nicer The room felt very fancy and bed super comfy There was even enough space in the room to do a workout on the floor

Negative_Review: Took 3 calls to find a clothes iron we could borrow none comes in room Couldn t get a crib because their maintenance person was out The 3 person room was extremely expensive even for Paris or New York standards and was basically a 2 person room with a cot slid in
Positive_Review: Room was decent size for Paris standards with windows that could open Air conditioning Great location

Negative_Review: Room was quite small Had booked a triple room but was surprised to see the small size for the price charged No room service
Positive_Review: The staff was courteous Location was good

Negative_Review: We requested car park space but were not told in advance that we couldn t park due to the Euro s
Positive_Review: Loved it Staff very informative and helpful

Negative_Review: The room was next to the elevator you can feel and hear the viberating sound in your room It kept me up The room keeper was not doing her his job shampoos werenot changed or added everyday the other bathroom stuff either Towels were fine The elevator was out of order for two freaking days I had to climbed the stairs to the 6th floor for two freaking days There was one reception worker with dark skin he was not nice when I approached him for info
Positive_Review: Very close to the Effiel tower and the EEFA europe You can see the effiel tower from the hotel bolcony Next door is a supermarket

Negative_Review: Room was extremely small suitable only for one person Negligible closet space Inconvenient to operate lights
Positive_Review: Convenient to Metro Renovated room Quiet

Negative_Review: The room that we stayed at the toilet is in a separate room while the sink is with the shower so it is a bit inconvenient
Positive_Review: The staff is very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: The month of June and July the parking garage is closed There was no warning and we paid for it We got a rental car cause we thought we didn t have to worry about the crazy parking on the streets Wrong we ended up parking and pulling a lot of heavy over a mile an half twice and was constantly stressed over the safety of the car
Positive_Review: Location
The hotel was well presented and comfortable The hotel s location is excellent within 5 mins walk of the Eiffel Tower and plenty of good restaurants The staff were very polite and helpful Many thanks
the location next to Champ de Mars Eiffel Tower Located next to a metro station which is nice The rooms are very clean and look great We had a room with view of the Eiffel Tower very nice

Negative_Review: The road was blocked due to some event because of which the taxi used to drop us far away and we had to walk in rain This should have been informed while making the booking
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Internet system less than desirable Was on off all the time needing to reconnect all the time Terrible
Positive_Review: Good sizable bed Clean and confortable

Negative_Review: Everything was top dollar I can t say anything bad or negative about this hotel
Positive_Review: Staff were so friendly house keeping every day was brilliant And gave us a room with an excellent view as requested

Negative_Review: Separate toilet from the bathroom with no facilities to wash hands in the toilet
Positive_Review: Great location close the the Eiffel tower Friendly and helpful staff Clean stylish and comfortable rooms

Negative_Review: i made full payment of my stay by cash and they also took money from my bank account its been three weeks now i am extremely frustrated as they are not giving me my money back
Positive_Review: location is good

Negative_Review: Everything was wonderful just hoping to be on the street side next time instead of back side Really nothing I didn t like I just wish I had different view Hotel was amazing Thank you for wonderful weekend
Positive_Review: The hotel was amazing in a perfect location We had a wonderful wedding anniversary weekend I can not thank Xavier enough for all his help Hotel room was clean and larger than expected Thank you Thank you for wonderful experience We will be back

Negative_Review: With this kind of price d breakfast should be included need to have more lively ambience in d lobby at least some music or something coz really like a dead ambience
Positive_Review: The location n front desk who helped me to get early check in supermarket next to d building restaurants around walking distance to Ecoile station Drinks in my fridge are all free Hermes toiletries

Negative_Review: Coffee not replenished in room and only one sachet of coffee on the first day anyway so none on the second Towels not folded up Asked for quiet room overlooked the street and not that quiet did not realise when checked in and then unpacked too late to change Room was rather on the small side too
Positive_Review: Reception staff very pleasant Location great Breakfast good if a little expensive

Negative_Review: room was clean and functional but nothing amazing It felt a bit overpriced for what it is I suppose on account of its location Our room overlooked the inner court I think a street view would be much better
Positive_Review: excellent location Staff was very friendly Was very quiet not sure if there were few guests or if sound proofing is really good

Negative_Review: The sound isolation is very bad we can clearly hear the traffic noise on the street Room is small
Positive_Review: Very friendly staffs and nice service Location of the hotel is very good very safe district 10 minutes walk to Eiffel Tower next to M8 subway line so it is convenient for travels to go to sight seeings Clean room
The hotel was beautiful It was a birthday and the hotel upgraded our room and had a bottle of champagne on ice for our arrival Such a lovely touch They could not of been more accommodating

Negative_Review: Mattress was extremely firm and uncomfortable to the point of not being able to sleep and waking up in extreme pain I have never in my life felt a harder mattress ever Could not upload any files using free wifi only download worked Hotel staff said that the mattresses were all the same in the hotel I would have changed hotels had I not prepaid the reservation This is the last time I will ever prepay for a room anywhere
Positive_Review: Great location clean new hotel Breakfast had good options Nice sized room junior suite for Paris

Negative_Review: Parking a car in the streets can be a real nightmare But the hotel itself is not responsible for that
Positive_Review: Excellent and very professional helpful staff Great location Very quiet Availability of a guarded car park nearby for a reasonable fee Very good restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: No stunning view in our room 506 Space in bathroom not very comfortable where the sink was and also the water didn t drain
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly polite and kind Marie at the restaurant was very five stars special

Negative_Review: There was no hotel parking so had to park in a parking area Thankfully just 50 yards from the hotel but cost 100 for two nights and two and a half days
Positive_Review: Could not have asked for a more helpful accomadating and pleasant staff The hotel is located two blocks from a park where you can walk right up to the Eiffle Tower roughly 300 yards away Our hotel even has a view of the top of the Eiffle Tower The hotel had the metro entrance just a block up the street as well as was located right near the army museum

Negative_Review: Wifi didn t work normally if guests tell us it doesn t work we switch on more routers nice so you just leave off the routers until it gets unbearably slow or disfunctional until someone calls you Fail
Positive_Review: Nice Room quiet

We rented the family suite for 4 and it was very roomy by Paris standards Free drinks in the frig expresso and coffee lovely toiletries and lots of little thoughtful extras e g chicolate Easter eggs Julien at the front desk could not have been more welcoming and hospitable He was wonderful Fabulous area Wish we d booked longer
Location is perfect room is very clean spacious and with fantastic view The stuff in front of the desk is so helpful and nice One even can speak Chinese Definitely will go again

Safe neighborhood with nice local cafes Eiffel view central location clean and tidy rooms very helpful and friendly employees Luggage service close to subway museums etc I already advised people to stay there in Paris

Negative_Review: Carpet floor was not clean and below old wooden floor was cracking rocking Toilet is so small almost 75 75 cm with no extract Room view dirty roof of building back side
Positive_Review: Nothing fancy normal stuff

Excellent location Within walking distance of Eiffel Tower metro bus Rue Cler restaurants Staff is very helpful and friendly especially Julien and Rafael who seem to go the extra mile to make our stay an excellent one

staffs in all departemnt of hotel are very nice polite and helpful we have been 4 days there and I didn t feel I m far from home i really missed the place and definitely i will go there again location is perfect it is close to bus stops and metro and it is classy area we had view of Eiffel Tower and our room was 4th floor junior room you can just walk to Eiffel Tower and champs elysees they are lots of restaurant around the hotel and a super market beside the hotel by the way area is very quite

Negative_Review: Had to unplug the noisy bar fridge overnight C est la vie
Positive_Review: Elegant stylish and comfortable Our room had a huge bathroom and tub Close to the Eiffel Tower and other major attractions Really good value for money in this city Metro station Ecole Militaire Line 8 is just around the corner Staff were kind knowledgeable and friendly Concierge Julien was particularly helpful

Negative_Review: There was no bar restaurant for evening meals
Positive_Review: Great location near the Eiffel Tower and the metro station Clean comfortable room Nice and quiet Good breakfast and free wifi

Negative_Review: nothing we did not like would certainly go again
Positive_Review: excellent room we were given an up grade excellent view wonderful staff fabulous location I could go on

Negative_Review: The mattress of the bed is too hard Pity This is the only negative note Really too hard at least for my taste
Positive_Review: The location is very good the private parking facilities at the nearby parking Joffre are very convenient the breakfast is excellent for a reasonable price the rooms are very clean and the lobby area welcoming I must note that the staff is extremely friendly helpful and polite This is to be mentioned as not so frequent in France The staff serving at breakfast Phon Roel and Anne Marie are particularly exceptional They may you feel like members of the family coming home

Negative_Review: No drawer space whatsoever We had to live out of our suitcases We had to sit on the luggage rack to be able to use the table TV ridiculously large for the room Housekeeper forgot to prepare our room on the first day So we had to make our own beds Complained and reception staff appalled never happened again
Positive_Review: The location was excellent close to Ecole Militaire and Les Invalides Metro stop and buses close to hotel and plenty of cafes restaurants and brasseries nearby Bathroom large and very well appointed Hotel very clean and comfortable WiFi excellent Attractive bedroom and comfortable bed Delightfully quiet everywhere in the hotel Air conditioning wonderfully quiet and very effective Staff very helpful Breakfast looked and smelt delicious but too pricey for us Tea offered in the room Incredible for France

Negative_Review: Please check the payment after we check the payment double charge I only booking the hotel and our customer already pay the hotel But in my credit card also pay to your hotel Please check
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: It was said the room for 3 persons is a small suite room when I made booking while indeed it s a standard room with an added sofa bed
Positive_Review: Location is very good safety near subway station and there are a lot of restaurants bars and supermarkets Breakfirst is perfect

Negative_Review: no idea I m from germany we like to have a strong coffee from a coffee machine
Positive_Review: The breakfast buffet was absolut top Many variations The staff was speaking german english and spanish The whole staff was really friendly more than I expected We get the room with the view to the eiffel tower In the room was for preparing coffee and tea and a bottle of water We enjoy the coffee and tea after a long travel when we arrived 20 30 the hotel

Thank you to Anne Marie Rafael and all the staff they were very welcoming and helpful The location was very good We easily walked or took the metro from a station very close to the hotel It was a pleasure to stay a the hotel de la Boudonnais

Negative_Review: A bar would have been nice but so many around it didn t matter Room was a good size for Paris and adequate for a base
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel with pleasant staff Superb location with metro bars and restaurants within a 3 5 minute walk Room 503 had a lovely little balcony and view towards Eiffel Tower Breakfast was nice with continental selection Good value for money WiFi worked well

Negative_Review: The bathroom sinks have the most bizzare flawed design water takes ages to drain Hardly a big problem but when everything else is great you notice
Positive_Review: I let the hotel know before hand that that I would be celebrating a big birthday during our stay they kindly upgraded us to a lovely big room with a balcony overlooking the Eiffel Tower had a bottle of champagne waiting for us in an ice bucket Lovely touch Thank you We loved watching the Eiffel Tower twinkle on the hour

Negative_Review: Internet connection was poor and disconnect oftenly but it wasn t such a big problem for us
Positive_Review: Eiffel tower was 5 10 minutes away from the hotel Metro station was very close View was great Staff was very helpfull I really loved this hotel

Negative_Review: Like most of the hotels in Paris it s a little bit overpriced compared to major European capitals and largest cities
Positive_Review: This hotel has a perfect location to visit Paris and to be close to the Champs de Mars Invalides Trocad ro and Tour Eiffel The room at the 6th floor got a nice view on a part of Paris the breakfast was excellent and the staff was very helpful We could leave our luggages until the evening before going back to airport

Very friendly and helpful front desk officers they arranged airport pick up and return service with very reasonable price excellent breakfast with wide variety of chees crapes breads muffins etc normally it would cost 10 15 person in a Caf good size of room for 4 Persons 6 7 min walking distance to Eifel Tower very close to metro station

Negative_Review: The internet was problematic It was frustratingly inconsistent It was the only glitch in an otherwise perfect stay
Positive_Review: The staff was helpful thoughtful and knowledgeable We liked the hotel and its people so much we have booked it for our return trip back to the States

Very friendly hotel great position to walk to the sights and very helpful and friendly staff We stayed in a family room which had plenty of room The breakfast was very good with plenty of choice Overall great stay and would stay there again

Negative_Review: After reading many reviews of free upgrades to a suite with a tower view we decided to book a suite Sadly this was at the back of the hotel and although the staff looked into moving us it was not possible The rear rooms overlook a courtyard which was the only disappointment to our stay
Positive_Review: The location was fantastic and right by the Metro The staff went above and beyond to help Great breakfast tidy and nicely finished hotel The bed was very comfortable Also loved the free soft drinks in the mini bar and coffee machine

Brilliant location and stunning view from hotel window In the true centre of Paris Staff anticipated my need even before I knew what I wanted Hotel room was spacious modern and shower was amazing Staff were incredibly friendly and area was beautiful Would recommend to anyone

Negative_Review: Our original room was perfect except for the noisy elevator right next to the headboard Also could use a little more food on site with afternoon tea
Positive_Review: The staff knows the area and what a nice residential area it turned out to be for us Looking for the real in Paris this is it Staff bent over backwards to a person Extra kudos for Xavier Nice New year s even without the fireworks we had prayed for

This hotel is perfect Amazing people excellent location friendly helpful staff This hotel is the best I have stayed in For the price it s worth it Extremely close to Eiffel Tower great location Excellent clean rooms
Staff were very friendly Helped us make bookings for a french restaurant and recommended some nice places to dine too Love the Hermes toiletteries provided

Negative_Review: I thought the restaurant had a bar which it did not but it was not an issue as lovely cafes near by
Positive_Review: Got a free upgrade as celebrating my husbands 40th and the room was very spacious and clean with a comfy bed Staff were very friendly and helpful especially when I left my bag containing passports in a taxi which we did manage to get back Very close to the Eiffel Tower and metro

Negative_Review: Sink was not working and water did not go away Room was not big enough for 4 people in family however we fit No hooks for clothes
Positive_Review: Good location Great bed Very good breakfast Attentive service They accommodated us in earlier at 1 PM Many good restaurants around

Given room with view of the Eiffel Tower from small balcony Huge bathroom with luxurious toiletries The front desk staff were very helpful with directions and restaurant recommendations Excellent location close to Champs du Mars Metro Rue Cler Seine River and easy walk to most sights We loved our stay at this hotel

Negative_Review: Poor customer service by receptionist only other staff are good offered room 602 which is very next to the lift was making lot of noise couldn t sleep at all when i bring to the notice of the reception staff advised me that I cannot expect all in one view was good however having said that you would not enjoy with lift noise and staff attitude
Positive_Review: Location

We absolutely loved our stay at Hotel de la Bourdonnais When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised with a room upgrade which had an amazing view of the Eiffel Tower Couldn t fault anything with our stay and would recommend to anyone wishing to enjoy a romantic break in Paris Will definitely be back Thank you
Great location staff was very helpful and friendly Room was spacious and beautifully appointed Just 2 blocks from the metro and within walking distance of Eiffel Tower restaurants and shopping

Negative_Review: First room they gave us was a bit small
Positive_Review: Great staff and location convenient walking distance to Eiffel Tower and Les Invalides Hotel upgraded us to a room with a balcony view of the Eiffel Tower Very nice

Great experience best location nice facilities it was our honeymoon trip they give us room upgrade and Champion cakes and cards to celebrate Best facilities clean room warm hearted staff I stayed 3 hotels in Paris this is simply the best will come to this hotel again when I next visit

Negative_Review: We were not able to find many resturants on the same street as the hotel The room was small but larger than most Paris hotels
Positive_Review: The staff was amazing They were all very kind and went out of their way to be helpful It is just around the corner from the metro station and down the street from the Eiffel Tower The room was clean and we had a balcony with a view of the tower This was perfect for our anniversary

Negative_Review: My only criticism would be they don t top up bathroom products and only one soap between shower bath and hand basins otherwise it was very good
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to a junior suite which just meant we had more room in the bedroom but it was very comfortable The staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: AC were not working but they fixed it Rooms are small This is a 4 Stars hotel ONLY for its location and nothing else So don t expect any 4 Stars luxury when you check in
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Location walking distance from the Eiffel Tower and the metro station cole Militaire Neighborhood is safe and very nice with a lot of really good restaurants There are a couple of restaurants next to the metro station that are open till 2 AM for late food There is a grocery store next to the hotel where you can buy water snacks and other stuff from there

Negative_Review: Room is small but biggest disappointment hassle was no chair much less desk in the room which makes catching up on work in the room difficult
Positive_Review: Very close to Ecole Militare Metro stop quiet room even for first floor street side Nice common areas on ground floor Spacious and nicely furnished bathroom Couple blocks from nice restaurants

Negative_Review: Soundproofing were really bad We can hear people walking around the corridor kids running and jumping around upstairs guest giggling from the room next door We end up request for a change of room to a more quiet one Private parking is very limited which is not mentioned in the web So better book immediately after you secure your booking
Positive_Review: It was wonderful Hotel pampered us with a complimentary Champagne and free upgrade for our honeymoon but too bad no stunning view Reception were all very friendly attentive and speak english very well Specially mention about David who guide us through the map attraction around hotels and suggestion on the best eiffel tower view in Paris and very helpful Hotel location is great 5 minute walks to the nearest Metro station

Negative_Review: One particular breakfast waiter wasn t too keen on having 3 young kids around He made it ample clear In fact was planning to take breakfast at the hotel for 4 mornings but ended up staying just once
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very welcoming and helpful

The location Stunning view of the Eiffel Tower during the evening from my hotel room under a couple of minutes to cross into the lovely park by the tower within easy walking distance of everywhere The bed and bathroom was also truly lovely A great sleep and powerful modern shower Will certainly stay here again

Walking distance to Paris attractions we had a balcony with a view of the Eifel Tower Fyodor at the front desk is wonderful if you need directions a cab or dinner Actually they were all helpful at the front desk Rroms were clean and hotel is well maintained

Negative_Review: Slight smell of damp on arrival in room and water pressure in shower could have been better
Positive_Review: Location was excellent hotel modern and clean very quiet well furnished large bathroom and bed was very comfortable

I spoke to three or four different staff at the reception during our stay but all of them were really very friendly We asked some questions about a VIP pass to Versailles the hotel sells at the reception and the staff didn t know the answer but we weren t too disappointed about that because he really tried to help us Also we lost hot water for few hours one night but we could see the staff again was really trying to help and it was fixed the next morning as he promised Customer service was just excellent at this hotel

Negative_Review: Wifi kept failing Room looking out onto internal courtyard not what expecting Would have been nice to have a view over the Eiffel Tower
Positive_Review: Location fabulous Staff friendly and very helpful Comfortable quiet room Location to metro and Eiffel Tower amazing

Negative_Review: The odor in the hallway and the room was terrible It was like staying in a smoking room although the staff said it s a non smoking hotel I bought an freshener but it didn t help the odor was too strong I should have chosen a slightly expensive hotel than La Bourdonnais Won t stay again and won t recommend unless you mind the odor
Positive_Review: Location was good enough as it is close to the Eiffel Tower Modern furnitures and fixtures by Paris hotel standards
Amazing hotel staff and location Easy access to metro and cabs My second time back and will definitely be back The first hotel I recommend to friends and family
The complimentary upgrade to a superior room was amazing Great location near to the Eiffel Tower and the street itself has restuarants souvenir shops and a supermarket right next door

What a lovely hotel It only took us about 4 minutes to walk to the Eiffel Tower and was so centrally located The staff spoke perfect English and were so kind and courteous We were on the top floor with a beautiful view of the Eiffel Tower from our balcony Our room was very clean comfortable and everything was up to date and modern I would absolutely love to stay at this hotel again when we return to Paris A

Excellent location very clean superb staff In particular a gentleman by the name of Xavier who helped us re arrange our river cruise meal with Bateaux Parisiens He kindly called Bateaux Parisiens and re arrange our original dinner meal when we missed the boat Bateaux Parisians staff member was extremely rude upon missing the boat and didn t even offer to help re arrange

Negative_Review: Breakfast was really disorganised The sink had a small blockage and they could not fix it there was no maintenance staff around
Positive_Review: Location is perfect The rooms was nice and clean Parking is good value for money

Negative_Review: Lack of restaurant bar in the hotel Overall the restaurant didn t matter but a bar would have been nice
Positive_Review: Location was perfect not only for the Eiffel Tower but the Metro for other attractions around the city

The reception is very kind and helpful Our kid left a cellphone under the pillow They kept it for us And when we come back 2 days later to pick it up we ask for some shopping information They are very patient and kind to help Tks a lot
